abstract: Despite a catalog of crises and near misses in recent years, BP has been chronically unable or unwilling to learn from its mistakes, an examination of its record shows, The New York Times reports.

lead_paragraph: Despite a catalog of crises and near misses in recent years, BP has been chronically unable or unwilling to learn from its mistakes, an examination of its record shows.

headline.main: BP’s Record, a History of Boldness and Blunders
